name: pokemon-showdown-client
description: PokemonShowdownClient (abbreviated PSC) is a high-level library for connecting to and interacting with the Pokemon Showdown server

scripts.prepublish: find . | grep -v './node_modules\|./.git' | grep .coffee$ | xargs coffee -c; sed -i '1i #!/usr/bin/env node' client/repl.js; chmod +x client/repl.js
